attributes.attribute01:
select nvl(t.alias, t.name) "Track"
     , s.session_num "Session Num"
     , s.presenter "Presenter", s.company "Company", s.title "Title"
  from ks_sessions s
     , ks_event_tracks t
 where s.event_id = t.event_id
   and s.event_track_id = t.id
   and s.event_id = :P1030_EVENT_ID
   and s.presenter_user_id = #ID#
  order by 1, 2
